name: You Found Me
description:
She is missing, go and find her...

You Found Me is a psychological horror project created in 2 weeks.

The struggle of mental health can often be lonely, and sometimes being alone is where the worst outcomes are met. Follow the path and you will see where that outcomes leads you...

Controls:

WASD: Movement

LMB interact

75% of all Donations will be given to the NAMI (Home | NAMI: National Alliance on Mental Illness) 

You Found Me is the first horror game project created by AGLgames.
